      • Ghost

              int maxHealth,
              int baseAttackDamage,
              int baseSuccessModifier,
              int baseDefenseModifier)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        location - the location of this Enemy
        type - the Ghost.GhostType of this Ghost
        adjective - a distinctive quality for this Ghost
        damageDiceSides - the number of sides for damage dice for this Ghost instance
        damageDiceCount - the number of damage dice rolled for each attack by this Ghost instance
        maxHealth - the maximum amount of health for this Enemy
        baseAttackDamage - the base damage dealt by this Enemy
        baseSuccessModifier - the base modifier for attack success checks for this Enemy
        baseDefenseModifier - the base modifier for mitigating attacking Combatants' attack success checks
